ANU.name: Baihua Fu
expertise: Decision Support And Group Support Systems
interest: Most of Dr Baihua Fu's research is focused on the development and improvement of environmental models to support management and decision making, particularly in the areas of:catchment-scale water quality modelling, uncertainty assessment of environmental models,ecological modelling, andintegrated modelling and assessment.
